property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Paratroopers Can Move During Non Combat
Paratroopers Can Attack Deep Into Enemy Territory
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
Unplaced units live when not placed
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Use Bombing Max Dice Sides And Bonus
Limit SBR Damage To Factory Production
notes
property.value:
Uses tww ruleset as of tww 2.7.5 STILL IN BETA TESTING, EXPECT BUGS.
<li>Only russia, germany, britain, and japan are actually playable, all other nations don't actually do anything. <li>THERE IS NO WATER. so don't go for naval units or techs. <li>READ TWW MANUAL for rules and unit info; it's not included in this distribution due to its large size.
You gain a national objective bonus for destroying TUV of other players each turn as follows: INDEPENDENTS ARENT WORTH THIS BONUS <li>TUV destroyed --- Total Bonus PU <li> 3 ---------- 1 <li> 10 ---------- 3 <li> 25 ---------- 7 <li> 50 ---------- 15
Give thanks to RolfLarsson and Hepps and everyone who helped with TWW; they made this tww conversion possible.
